articles.title: Suspect in Charlie Kirk's killing left a note and confessed in texts, prosecutor says
articles.description: A prosecutor has revealed that the suspect in the killing of conservative activist Charlie Kirk left a note indicating his plan to carry out the act and later confessed to the crime in text messages. This has been a major development in a case that has drawn significant national attention.

articles.title: King Charles III greets Trump in Windsor at start of president's second state visit to the UK
articles.description: President Donald Trump has begun his second state visit to the United Kingdom, where he was formally greeted by King Charles III at Windsor Castle. The visit is expected to include discussions on trade and technology, but has also been met with protests related to Trump's past associations.

articles.title: Robert Redford, Oscar-winning director, actor and indie patriarch, dies at 89
articles.description: Legendary actor and director Robert Redford has passed away at the age of 89. Redford was a celebrated figure in Hollywood, known for his Oscar-winning directorial work and his iconic acting roles, as well as his significant contributions to independent film through the Sundance Institute.
